item.title: Tweet - 1141606631387607045
item.description: If you live in Ely, you should see how local democracy works. When the local Tories don’t like the result, they call an extraordinary meeting and overturn it. #chumocracy I’m sure none of them would stand to gain personally… ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0
